posse.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a group of the same kind of people
posse.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: I was surrounded by a posse of photographers.
posse.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a group of men gathered together by a sheriff (=local law officer) in the US in past times to help catch a criminal
posse.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: someone’s group of friends – used especially by young people
posse.translation[0].definitions[3].defi: a group of friends from a particular place who share an interest in rap, hip-hop, or house music
